price: 70. En wees niet bedroefd voor hen, noch wordt (aan de ellende) overgelaten vanwege wat zij samenzweren.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
